String.string: Find Olivung on the Island of Dawn.
Obtain the Brutal Searing Fangspawn's Fire Sac and deliver it to Olivung.
Try the Hell's Wings. [Press key to open inventory and right-click the Hell's Wings.]
Speak with Olivung in the Southern Checkpoint.
Use the last piece of the Aspiration Stone to empower the Eternal Crown. [Press key to open inventory and right-click the Aspiration Stone - Last Piece.]
Deliver Olivung's Lunchbox to Meren in Highwatch.
